version.title: Dependency version
version.description:
The version of the dependency.
Can be omitted and the Modification UBT Editor Tool will use ^installedVersion
Note that the dependency must be installed in the project for the automatic detection to work, otherwise the template will be skipped entirely.

optional.title: Optional
optional.description: A plugin is optional if it can be removed or added at any time without breaking existing world data.

templates.title: Mod templates
templates.description: A list of templates to be added to the mod template list.

name.title: Template name
name.description: The name of the template to be displayed in the mod template list.

description.title: Template description
description.description: The description of the template to be displayed in the mod template list.

path.title: Template path
path.description: The relative path to the template folder.
